allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Whisper voice-to-text transcription system

Implemented a full-stack voice-to-text transcription application using OpenAI Whisper with FastAPI backend and Angular frontend.

Features:
- Audio file upload with drag & drop support \(MP3, WAV, M4A, FLAC, OGG, WEBM\)
- Browser-based audio recording \(up to 30 seconds\)
- Real-time transcription using Whisper \(GPU-accelerated with RTX 5090\)
- Multiple Whisper model support \(tiny, base, small, medium, large\)
- Model download progress tracking with real-time SSE updates
- Audio playback with play/stop controls
- Transcription history with delete functionality
- Editable transcription text
- Language selection support
- Dark mode UI

Backend Architecture \(Clean Architecture\):
- Domain layer: Entities, repositories, services \(business logic\)
- Application layer: Use cases, DTOs \(orchestration\)
- Infrastructure layer: Whisper service, SQLite persistence, file storage
- Presentation layer: FastAPI REST API, Angular SPA

API Endpoints:
- POST /api/v1/transcriptions - Upload and transcribe audio
- GET /api/v1/transcriptions - Get transcription history
- GET /api/v1/transcriptions/{id} - Get specific transcription
- DELETE /api/v1/transcriptions/{id} - Delete transcription
- GET /api/v1/transcriptions/{id}/audio - Download original audio
- GET /api/v1/models/status/{model} - Check model cache status
- GET /api/v1/models/download-progress/{model} - SSE stream for download progress
- GET /api/v1/models/available - List available models

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Python 3.9+, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, SQLite, OpenAI Whisper, PyTorch
- Frontend: Angular 17, TypeScript, RxJS
- GPU: CUDA support for accelerated inference
- Audio: ffmpeg for audio processing
